You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN SEARCH
Explore Einstein Search

Einstein Search gives the global search bar more power and intelligence from the first click. Work faster, complete tasks directly from the search results, and get results that are most relevant to you. With personalization, actionable instant results, and natural language search, Einstein Search can help improve your productivity.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience and the Salesforce Mobile app
Available in: Essentials, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions

Whether you search for records or want more information, Einstein Search gives you a quick and accessible result.

Receive personalized results based on how you work in Salesforce.
See instant suggested records and previews when you start typing.
Enter a term, and search generates a recommended result.
Use common words and phrases in the search bar and get relevant information.
Search for Records
Your search for records begins with the global search bar at the top of each page. From the moment you click the search bar, search starts delivering results.
Get Personalized Results
Personalization is an AI feature that reorders search results based on the objects and records you work with most. Each time you search, personalization learns more about your preferences, which improves your search results.
See Instant Actionable Results
The moment you put your cursor in the global search bar, you see suggested searches and record previews based on your recent activity. Use these results to easily access records. You can also complete actions, such as editing a record and accessing related quick links.
Use Natural Language Search
Natural language search (NLS) gives you quick access to lists of records so that you can find the information that you need. Enter everyday words and phrases, such as my open opportunities this month or cases closed last week in the global search bar.
Recommended Results
Einstein Search shows you a recommended result when it finds a good match for your search terms. It places this result first along with actions and links to related records.
Search Index
The search index makes it quicker and more efficient for the search engine to retrieve relevant information for a user’s query. Without a search index, the search engine scans all content in every document or record in your organization each time a user performs a search, which is time-consuming and resource-intensive. Explore how the search index can improve your search engine.
Lookup Searches
With lookup fields, you associate two records to create a relationship. For example, a contact record includes an account lookup field that associates the contact with its account.
Use Natural Language Search Filters (Pilot)
Einstein Search can understand a natural language search in different ways. If Einstein doesn’t interpret your search as you intended, you can change the filters that Einstein applied to the search. After you select new values, the search results are updated in real time.
Dive into Einstein Search for Knowledge
Artificial Intelligence (AI) powers Einstein Search for Knowledge to find the most relevant knowledge articles for service agents and their customers. Improve your filtering experience and use multi-language search support to narrow down your search results faster. Einstein Search for Knowledge remembers your filters and saves you time when you search for similar articles.
Get Relevant Search Answers
Resolve issues quickly and deflect cases with Einstein Search Answers and generative AI Search Answers. Enter a question or phrase in the global search bar, knowledge sidebar, or Experience site. Search then extracts or generates the most relevant response from your knowledge sources. Search Answers supports only English queries and searches English-only articles.
Filter Out Your Knowledge Search
Narrow the focus of your knowledge search and find articles that are the most helpful to you. From the global search bar, you can filter out your search criteria to knowledge.
Refine Search With Wildcards and Operators
Get more control over your search results by using wildcards and operators in your searches. Using wildcards and operators in your searches can ensure you’re seeing all applicable records in your search results. Learn how to use them and their limitations.
Getting Insights with Search Analytics (Pilot)
Discover actionable insights with Search Analytics. Build dashboards to analyze your data. Use insights to make changes to the search engine, optimize content, and train users.

title: Personalized Search in Salesforce with Einstein Search
